Text: In Rare Interview, Angelina Talks About Her Split From Brad Pitt, Her Family and The Secret To Her Flawless Skin

Angelina Jolie, best known for her roles in Tomb Raider and Mr and Mrs Smith, where she met and fell in love with co-star Brad Pitt, ran into marital woes after “disobeying” Brad’s wishes in the months leading up to their divorce. Find out why Angelina’s passion for entrepreneurship caused strife and jealously and ultimately lead to divorce.

Days after breaking news suggesting that Brad blamed Angelina for their divorce and denied rumors that his drinking led to child abuse, Angelina sits down to discuss her all-female-owned “Passion Business” and exposes raw emotions when we ask about her relationship.
Interviewer: First things first, tell me about your new skin care business.

Angelina: All my life I've been passionate about taking care of my skin due to the pressures of Hollywood to stay young and look flawless. For the last 20 years I’ve been traveling the world and sourcing organic ingredients and skin care remedies. The culmination is the launch of my all-female-owned skin care line which combines the world’s richest and most sought after ingredients at affordable and everyday prices.
Interviewer: What is the name of the new skin care line?

Angelina: It's called Emollient, and once again, is owned and managed by only women. We’ve partnered with the world’s most successful dermatologists and Hollywood’s A list to master a regimen that is truly perfect.

The feedback I have received is unbelievably rewarding and fulfilling - I get fan mail from thousands of women who say they look two, five and even ten years younger after using Emollient for a few short weeks - that makes me happy. I actually received offers to partner with L'Oreal and Olay, but turned them down as I want the product to remain affordable by selling it directly consumers.
Interviewer: We heard many rumors about your divorce with Brad Pitt, could you set the record straight?

Angelina: A relationship is never black-and-white and while there are dozens of things that Brad and I simply will never see eye-to-eye on, the differences in raising kids ultimately forced us to split-up. His drinking became a problem and he started to lose opportunities in Hollywood. He even was jealous that I wouldn’t allow him to promote Emollient, as I wanted to keep it fully female managed. Ultimately, he is the father of my children so I won’t say too much.
COUNTLESS AGING CELEBS ADMIT THEY AVOIDED SURGERY AND LOOK 10 YEARS YOUNGER USING Emollient ANTI-AGING.

“THE ADVANCES NICOME HAS MADE IN THE ANTI-AGING SKINCARE INDUSTRY ARE REMARKABLE. I WOULDN’T BELIEVE IT IF I HADN’T HAD THE CHANCE TO TRY IT OUT FOR MYSELF. I KNEW NICOME WAS AGING WELL BUT THOUGHT IT WAS HER GENETICS. AFTER USING Emollient ANTI-AGING FOR TWO WEEKS I WAS ALREADY LOOKING YEARS YOUNGER." - REESE WITHERSPOON

"I REFUSE TO WEAR A LOT OF MAKEUP AND THANKS TO Emollient ANTI-AGING I DON’T NEED TO. MY SKIN HAS NEVER LOOKED BETTER AND IT LOOKS YOUNGER THAN IT DID 10 YEARS AGO. I LOVE WAKING UP KNOWING I DON’T NEED TO BOTHER TRYING TO COVER UP MY SKIN." - KATE MIDDLETON

"I NOTICED THAT MY SKIN WAS LOOKING TIRED. IT WAS DULL AND STARTING TO LOSE ITS ELASTICITY. ANGELINA GAVE ME A SAMPLE OF Emollient ANTI-AGING AND THE PRODUCT IS A MIRACLE WORKER. IT ONLY TOOK A FEW DAYS FOR MY SKIN TO BE TAUT, SMOOTH AND GLOWING AGAIN JUST LIKE IT WAS IN MY 20’S." - EMMA THOMPSON
While Emollient is sold all over the world, Angelina didn't want our readers to miss the opportunity to experience the benefits of Emollient for themselves.
Angelina is offering our lucky readers the opportunity to try Emollient for an incredibly low price.
No need to run to stores or queue. You can order your first bottle of the product right now from the comfort of your home.
If you want to eliminate your wrinkles and restore that youthful glow on your face, be sure to use Emollient every day. This product is designed to give incredible results in the fight against aging.
Due to the high demand of Emollient, we can only offer a limited quantity of discount bottles, so you will have to act quickly to take advantage of this incredible offer.
Lacey Johnson, age 53 submitted this photo of her results with Emollient Anti-Aging. You look great, Lacey!
'The Emollient Anti-Agingis the absolute best wrinkle removing product I've ever used. I thoughtmy days of looking young were long gone. I can't thank you enough for this!'
'I've been trying to get rid of my eye bags for almost 10 years. Emollient Anti-Aging got rid of them in a week. Thanks so much!'
'For the first time in forever I am finally happy when I look in the mirror every morning. I haven't felt this confident in decades!'
'Thank God I didn't go through with that face lift... I got the same results, for less than a cup of coffee!'

'Ive only been using the Emollient Anti-Aging cream for 2 weeks, and I love it!!!!!!!! I have seen a visible change in my skin, best of all my husband complimented me on my skin after just 2 weeks!!!!! He thought I had foundation on, and I did'nt that is just fabulous!!!!!!!!'
'I have been using Emollient Anti-Aging and I am incredibly impressed with the results! My skin is brighter and it is very apparent that my skin is more hydrated and dewy.'

'YES!! Finally, I have found a skin care range that works. At 56 years old this is the first time I've had products that work for me.'

Angie Clayton
Miami, FL
